messages.subject: RE: [nihontostudy] Book sale
messages.msgSnippet: Bernard, I have copies of the Compton 100 Masterpieces for sale, among many other books of interest. Check my website. (Tom did not have a copy on his list,
messages.messageBody:
Bernard,

I have copies of the Compton "100 Masterpieces" for sale, among many other
books of interest. Check my website.

(Tom did not have a copy on his list, in all fairness.)

Craig L. Harris Bridge of Dreams, LLC
Books from and about Asia o: 847 696-9774
www.bridgeofdreams.com c: 847-846-7701


-----Original Message-----
From: Bernard & Evelen Alexander [mailto:ebbs@...]
Sent: Tuesday, March 08, 2005 12:19 AM
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Book sale



Hi Tom
What do you have for sale??
In English
100 masterpeaces of the Compton collection would be nice. Regards Bernard
Mizuta school collector
----- Original Message -----
From: "tom helm" <junkmail@...>
To: <nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, March 08, 2005 5:36 PM
Subject: [nihontostudy] Book sale


>
> Apologies for crass commercialism;
>
> All,
> I am clearing out some shelf space to make room for yet more
> books. Please help me provide a good home for my old books. There is
> something for everyone Japanese Art, history, Martial arts, Nihonto,
> tsuba and kodogu. There is something in every language as well so if
> you read French, German, Italian, Dutch, Czech, Japanese or even
> English you'll find something you like here. Please email me OFF LIST
> if you are interested in seeing the list of titles.
> thanks,
> Tom

messages.msgSnippet: yes, Tom. I would be interested in seeing the list of titles! Thanks, Lori ... From: tom helm To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com Sent: Monday, March 07, 2005

yes, Tom. I would be interested in seeing the list of titles!

----- Original Message -----
From: tom helm
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, March 07, 2005 9:36 PM
Subject: [nihontostudy] Book sale


Apologies for crass commercialism;

All,
I am clearing out some shelf space to make room for yet more
books. Please help me provide a good home for my old books. There is
something for everyone Japanese Art, history, Martial arts, Nihonto,
tsuba and kodogu. There is something in every language as well so if
you read French, German, Italian, Dutch, Czech, Japanese or even
English you'll find something you like here. Please email me OFF LIST
if you are interested in seeing the list of titles.
thanks,
Tom

messages.subject: Book sale
messages.msgSnippet: Apologies for  crass commercialism; All, I am clearing out some shelf space to make room for yet more books. Please help me provide a good home for my old
messages.messageBody:
Apologies for crass commercialism;

All,
I am clearing out some shelf space to make room for yet more
books. Please help me provide a good home for my old books. There is
something for everyone Japanese Art, history, Martial arts, Nihonto,
tsuba and kodogu. There is something in every language as well so if
you read French, German, Italian, Dutch, Czech, Japanese or even
English you'll find something you like here. Please email me OFF LIST
if you are interested in seeing the list of titles.
thanks,
Tom
